name: autobiographer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who writes an autobiography (= a book about the writer's own life): Biographers tend to be more accurate and objective than autobiographers. See
autobiography
More examplesFewer examplesCelebrity autobiographers seem to be getting younger.He was one of the great critics of his time and a great autobiographer. Both documentary photographers and autobiographers were shortlisted for the prize.Autobiographers tell their own stories.
